title: Not-On-the-Track (NOTT) Point
description: A point given for an opponent who is not on the track (such as Skaters in the $Penalty:penalty$ Box) that the $Jammer:jammer$ earns $immediately:immediately$ upon earning a $pass:earned-pass$ on any opposing $Blocker:blocker$, per $trip through the Pack:trip-through-the-pack$.
